<HEAD>
<TITLE>exv10w15</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>EXHIBIT 10.15</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">City of Buenos Aires, December&nbsp;28, 2006
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Messrs.<BR>
Pan American Energy LLC Sucursal Argentina (<I>Argentine Branch</I>)<BR>
Av. Leandro N. Alem 1180<BR>
(1001)&nbsp;Buenos Aires

</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U>Re.</U>: Strategic Agreement for the rendering of Drilling, Completion and Workover Services of
oil and/or gas wells. Amendment # 2.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Dear Sirs,
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">We hereby submit to your consideration our sole amendment proposal (the &#147;Amendment&#148;) to the
Strategic Agreement for the rendering of Drilling, Completion and Workover Services of wells
located in the area of the Gulf of San Jorge, Provinces of Chubut and Santa Cruz, and other related
services transcribed in our note dated July&nbsp;1, 2003, the text of which is transcribed herein below.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">All capitalized terms used in this Amendment that have not been expressly defined shall have the
meaning assigned to them by the Strategic Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&#147;WHEREAS,
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>taking into account the changes in prices and costs verified in the local market, it is
the PARTIES intention to adjust the tariffs and work certification modalities set forth by
the Strategic Agreement;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>taking into account that opportunities have been detected, it is the PARTIES intention
the adjustment of the drilling equipments to the prevailing operational conditions in the
rendering of the SERVICES, formalizing an adjustment of the Technical Specifications
attached to the Strategic Agreement;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>the PARTIES have agreed that due to the work experience registered as of the beginning
of the Strategic Agreement to the date, it would be of mutual convenience to extend its
term.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">THEREFORE the PARTIES agree to execute this Amendment under the following terms:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U>1. PARTIES</U><BR>
DLS Argentina Limited &#151; Sucursal Argentina, with legal domicile at Sarmiento 663, City of Buenos
Aires, hereinafter referred to as &#147;DLS&#148; and PAN AMERICAN ENERGY LLC &#151; Sucursal Argentina, with
legal domicile at Av. Leandro N. Alem 1180 of the City of Buenos Aires, hereinafter referred to as
&#147;PAE&#148;, (both parties jointly referred to as the &#147;PARTIES&#148; and individually as &#147;PARTY&#148;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U>2. PURPOSE</U><BR>
The purpose of this Amendment is to modify the Strategic Agreement in the following aspects:
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%"><B>2.1. Tariffs</B><BR>
The tariffs that DLS shall be entitled to charge for the rendering of the SERVICES, as of
January&nbsp;1, 2006 shall be those established in Appendix&nbsp;I &#147;Tariffs&#148; attached to the present
Amendment, which nullifies and replaces all prior consideration with reference to this
issue contained in the Strategic Agreement and its amendments prior to the present one.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%"><B>2.2. Technical Specification</B>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">The drilling equipments that DLS shall use for the rendering of the SERVICES will have to
conform completely to what it is set forth in Appendix&nbsp;II &#147;Technical Appendix &#151; IIA &#151;
DRILLING IN THE GOLFO SAN JORGE BUSINESS UNIT&#148; attached to the present Amendment, which
nullifies and replaces the document with equivalent content of the Strategic Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">In addition, DLS shall provide the main and ancillary equipment necessary for the provision
of the SERVICES in accordance with the API Standards and the Norms and Standards set forth
in Appendix&nbsp;III of the present Amendment, and with the specific Application Norms referred
in them.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%"><B>2.3. Term</B><BR>
The Strategic Amendment modified by the present Amendment shall have a term of five (5)
years as of the Effective Date of the present and shall remain in effect up to the
fulfillment of the established term, date in which it will finalize without requiring
further action and without the need of any prior notice in that direction.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">The term previously set forth, however, will be subject to the early termination
stipulations which are established in the Documents of the Strategic Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U>3. RENDERING OF THE SERVICES</U><BR>
The Services that constitute the subject matter of this Agreement shall be rendered exclusively to
the extent to which they are required by PAE and in the amount determined by the latter, in
accordance with the guidelines set forth by the Strategic Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U>4. RATIFICATION</U><BR>
All terms and conditions not expressly amended by the present Amendment shall continue to be
governed by the Strategic Agreement, whose terms and conditions are deemed to be reproduced herein
and ratified to all effects.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The present offer shall be considered accepted by you when Pan American Energy LLC (Sucursal
Argentina) pays the first invoice which DLS Limited Argentina (Sucursal Argentina) presents in
accordance with the new tariffs set forth in the preceding Article&nbsp;2.1..
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For the purposes of this Amendment the payment date shall be considered as the &#147;Effective Date&#148; of
the Amendment.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Sincerely,
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">/s/ Mart&#237;n Z&#246;ldi
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Mart&#237;n Z&#246;ldi<BR>
Vice President

</DIV>



<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>


<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><U><B>APPENDIX I &#151; PRICES</B></U>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The present Appendix&nbsp;I forms part of the &#147;Strategic Agreement for the rendering of Drilling,
Completion and Workover Services of oil and gas wells&#148; dated
January&nbsp;1, 2006 (hereinafter, the
&#147;Agreement&#148; or the &#147;Alliance&#148;). All capitalized terms that are not expressly defined by the present
instrument shall have the meaning assigned to them by the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left"><B>1.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>INTRODUCTION</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The PARTIES acknowledge that the compensation scheme described below has been designed by
mutual agreement for the purpose of facilitating the achievement of the goals set for the
Alliance and, to this effect, such scheme may be revised and amended at the request of any of
the PARTIES, on the basis that the operation practices and/or a change in the external
conditions during the term of the Agreement reveal a discrepancy between the intended results
and the results actually achieved.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Likewise, at any time during the term of the Agreement any PARTY may propose any amendment to
the present compensation scheme that might reinforce the effective achievement of the intended
goals.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In any case, the proposed amendments shall require both PARTIES approval in order to be
incorporated to the Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left"><B>2.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>QUOTATION CURRENCY AND ADJUSTMENT FOR INFLATION</B></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>2.1.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Mixed Unit</B></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The prices contained in the present Appendix&nbsp;I are expressed in Mixed Units, hereinafter MU; a
MU is a currency unit defined for the sole purpose of facilitating the management of the prices
of the Agreement.<BR>
MU result from directly adding the amounts in US Dollars (USD)&nbsp;and in legal tender Argentine
Pesos ($) in which any price may be broken down according to the PARTIES agreement. Therefore
MU shall become completely defined by identifying the USD proportion in each MU, since the
remaining complementary part corresponds to $.<BR>
The corresponding complete notation shall be: MU(X%USD), which means that every MU shall be
composed of X% USD and (100-X)% $.<BR>
For the purpose of clarifying the meaning and application of the MU, the following two examples
may be used:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Case 1: 100 MU(30%USD) are equivalent to USD30 &#043; $70<BR>
Case 2: 200 MU (60%USD) are equivalent to USD120 &#043; $80</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In this Agreement, when a price is expressed in MU(X%USD), the amount corresponding to USD
shall be referred to as USD Portion and the amount corresponding to $ shall be referred to
as $ Portion.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In the examples above, in the first case the USD Portion is 30 and the $ Portion is 70; in
the second case, the USD Portion is 120 and the $ Portion is 80.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>2.2.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Ii Adjustment Index</B></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>For the purposes of attenuating the significant variations on profitability that
inflation/deflation processes may impose on contracts executed on the basis of fixed prices,
the Parties agree to review and eventually adjust the different prices and tariffs contained in
the present Appendix&nbsp;I on a monthly basis, by using the Ii Adjustment Index; the Index general
calculation way and application procedure are the following:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Ii Adjustment Index corresponding to the &#147;i&#148; period shall be calculated on a
monthly basis according to the following formula:</TD>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>where</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>IFASP: Cost in $ of an intervention crew composed or 1 driller, 1 derrickman and 3
roughnecks as stated in the Services Salary Table of the Collective Bargaining
Agreement for the FASPyGP, considering the agreement&#146;s basic gross salaries (no extras)
plus employer&#146;s contributions to the Retirement Fund, Act 19.032, Medical Care and
Labor Risk Insurance. The annual statutory bonus and employer&#146;s contributions
percentages shall also be added, including the Cuota Solidaridad (<I>Solidarity
Contribution</I>) minus the recovery of tax credits.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>IGOIL: Price in $ of diesel oil in bulk in Comodoro Rivadavia</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>IPP: Producer&#146;s Basic Prices Index</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Sub-indexes &#145;i-1&#146; indicate that the value corresponds to the period preceding the &#145;i&#146;
period regarding which the Adjustment Index is being calculated.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Sub-indexes &#145;0&#146; indicate that the value corresponds to the initial month, defined as
December, 2005.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Coefficients A, B and C shall be defined for each particular tariff.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">2.2.2.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The &#145;i&#146; period adjusted tariff shall result from multiplying the $ Portion of the
tariff by the Ii Adjustment Index calculated in accordance with section 2.2.1 above.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In the explanatory examples used in section 2.1, if for a particular month the
Adjustment Index was Ii = 1.05, the payable amounts would be the following:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Case 1: 100 MU(30%USD) are equivalent to USD30 &#043; $70&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;USD30 &#043; $73.5 are payable<BR>
Case 2: 200 MU(60%USD) are equivalent to USD120 &#043; $80&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;USD120 &#043; $84 are payable</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">2.2.3.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Adjustment Index for a particular month calculated according to above described
methodology shall require prior approval by PAE in order to be effectively applicable to
the tariffs. Following approval the adjustment shall remain in effect until replaced by a
new Adjustment Index approved by PAE.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">2.2.4.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Under no circumstances shall the USD Portion of the tariff be affected by adjustments
for inflation.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">2.2.5.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The variables selected to design the Adjustment Index as well as their respective
coefficients A, B and C regarding each particular tariff may be replaced by new variables
and coefficient values provided the Parties agree to do so.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left"><B>3.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>COMPENSATION SCHEME</B></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>


<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%"><B>3.1. </B><U><B>Drilling Service</B></U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">Compensation to be paid by PAE to DLS for the drilling service rendered in accordance with the
scope, terms and conditions of the Agreement and its Appendixes and the type of equipment used:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="8%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;Small Equipment&#148;: Rigs Nbr. 101. 102, 104, 111, 136 and 154, and</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="8%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;Large Equipment&#148;: Rigs Nbr. 113, 148 and 150,</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">shall be subject to the following scheme:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>3.1.1.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>Wells between 900 and 2,700 mts. depth / Conventional drilling</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The drilling of wells whose final depth is between 900 and 2,700 mts. and which have been
drilled by using the standard methodology specified in Appendix&nbsp;II, or by using
methodologies previously tested and adopted by the PARTIES by mutual agreement and which
therefore cannot be termed as &#147;tests&#148; (hereinafter, &#147;Conventional Drilling&#148;), shall be
compensated with a lump sum (&#147;<I>lump sum</I>&#148;) for each completed well, to be determined in
accordance to the following formula:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B><I>LS = K n x T <SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">Std</SUB></I></B>

</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>where:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD><B><I>LS </I></B><I>= Lump Sum </I>&#091;MU(25%USD)&#093;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD><B><I>Kn </I></B>= Standard Hourly Rate in accordance with the size of the equipment</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 9%; margin-top: 6pt"><B><I>K1 &#147;Small Equipment&#148; </I></B>= 1,259.13 UM(25%USD)/hour
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 9%; margin-top: 6pt"><B><I>K2 &#147;Large Equipment&#148; </I></B>= 1,345.35 UM(25%USD)/hour
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD><B><I>T </I></B><SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom"><I>Std</I></SUB> = Standard drilling Time measured in hours, which shall be determined on the
basis of the final depth of the completed well <B><I>TD </I></B>expressed in meters using the notation:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B><I>T <SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">Std</SUB> = </I></B>&#951;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">i x112x<B><I>EXP</I></B>(0.00048x<B><I>TD</I></B>)</SUB>

</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>where &#951;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">i</SUB> is the efficiency applicable to the period &#145;i&#146; for which
the Standard Time is being calculated. The &#951;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">i</SUB> efficiency shall be
recalculated every 6&nbsp;months as from the effective date of the Agreement using the notation:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="60%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD width="11%">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD width="11%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="11%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="33%">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Head -->
<!-- Begin Table Body -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD valign="top" nowrap><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&#951;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">i</SUB> = &#951;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">i-1 X</SUB> { 1- &#091;(1-
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">&#931; &#932;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">Real</SUB>
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">) x 0.5&#093;}
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR style="font-size: 1px">
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top" style="border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">&#931; &#932;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom">Std(i-1)</SUB></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>where:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD>&#931;<B> T</B><SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom"><B>Real</B></SUB> is the summation of the time actually used in the
drilling of all the wells certified under the Lump Sum tariff and carried out during the
past 12&nbsp;months of operation.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD>&#931;<B> T </B><SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom"><B>Std(i-1)</B></SUB> is the summation of the time anticipated by the function
<B><I>T </I></B><SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom"><B><I>Std</I></B></SUB> in effect during the period immediately prior to the period for which the
efficiency is being calculated, applied to the same wells as referred above.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#951;<SUB style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-bottom"><B>i-1</B></SUB> is the efficiency corresponding to the immediately previous period. It is
hereby established that the efficiency corresponding to the initial 6&nbsp;months period equals
1 (one).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>Deviations beyond 30 % of the real time on the standard curve</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Wells which depths are between 900 and 2700 meters and which real drilling time exceeds in
more than 30 % the standard time for such depth, shall be certified under the hourly tariff
methodology, as provided in paragraph 3.1.2.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>For the purposes of the present section, the referred drilling times comprise as from the
beginning of the dismantling of the equipment at one site up to the beginning of the
dismantling of the equipment at the next site, including transport time from one site to
the other one.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>Logging Hours</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In case that during the completion of a well more than 38.25 hours are used in logging
operations, an additional amount shall be paid in addition to the lump sum &#147;<B><I>LS</I></B>&#148;, to be
determined in accordance to the following notation:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>H1 x SHO &#043; H2 x OHR</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>where:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B><I>H1 </I></B>= logging hours following the first 38.25 and up to a maximum of 48 total hours.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B><I>H2 </I></B>= logging hours following the first 48 hours</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B><I>SHOn </I></B>= as defined in section 3.1.4</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B><I>OHRn </I></B>= as defined in section 3.1.2</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>3.1.2.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>Wells over 2,700 mts. depth and TESTS</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Wells of a projected final depth exceeding 2,700m or wells in which the PARTIES decide
to use technologies or procedures as TESTS shall be compensated through the Hourly Rate
plus reimbursable costs system.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The materials and services actually employed during the drilling and not included in
the equipment&#146;s hourly compensation shall be reimbursed by PAE to DLS at the
presentation of the corresponding expenses vouchers or through the use of unit price
lists approved by the PARTIES in due time.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Such materials and services comprise, among others: Drill Bits, Mud Materials, Water
Transport, Rentals, etc.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD><B><I>NDT </I></B>is the Net Drilling Time measured in hours as from the well spuding up to the
completion of the works and dismantling of the equipment; the amount PAE shall pay DLS
in order to compensate the use of the drilling equipment shall be calculated as the
result of <B><I>NDT </I></B>x <B><I>OHRn</I></B>, where:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD><B><I>OHR1 </I></B>= Operation Hourly Rate &#147;Small
Rigs&#148; = 902.71 MU(18%USD)/hour</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD><B><I>OHR2 </I></B>= Operation Hourly Rate &#147;Large
Rigs&#148; = 993.42 MU(18%USD)/hour</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>DTA Tariff</B></U></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<P><HR noshade><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The compensation to be paid by PAE to DLS for Dismantling, Transport and Assemblage
(DTA)&nbsp;of the rigs shall be:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>DTA1 &#147;Small Rigs&#148; = 50,843.69 MU(18%USD)<BR>
DTA2 &#147;Rigs 113 and 148&#148; = 74,030.90 MU(18%USD)<BR>
DTA3 &#147;Rigs 150&#148; = 121,467.31 MU(18%USD)</TD>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Forklifts (<I>autoelevadores</I>)</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>

</TR>

<TR>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Monitoring systems (Pason)</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>TDOSM = Daily Operation Tariff = 132.57 MU(100%USD)</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>3.1.3.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>Deepenings exceeding 2,700 mts. depth</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In case of deepenings exceeding 2,700m for all types of wells having an original final
depth of less than 2,700m, the total compensation shall be calculated as the summation
of the LS (<I>Lump Sum</I>) corresponding to 2,700m, calculated as described in 2.1.1, plus
the amount resulting of applying the Hourly Rate plus Reimbursable Costs system defined
in 2.1.2, applied as from 2,700m depth up to the completion of the well.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>3.1.4.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>Stand By Rate</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Stand By Rate applicable as provided for by the Technical Appendix shall be:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></TD>
